title: Bump micrometer.metrics.version from 1.6.2 to 1.6.13
body:
Bumps `micrometer.metrics.version` from 1.6.2 to 1.6.13. Updates `micrometer-registry-prometheus` from 1.6.2 to 1.6.13
Release notes

Sourced from micrometer-registry-prometheus's releases.

1.6.13

:beetle: Bug Fixes

  • DefaultLongTaskTimer histogram bucket counting logic fix #2851
  • Possible "memory-leak" in KafkaStreamsMetrics #2843

:hammer: Dependency Upgrades

  • Upgrade to wavefront-sdk-java 2.6.6 #2860
  • Upgrade to signalfx-java 1.0.13 #2859
  • Upgrade to reactor 3.3.22, reactor-netty 0.9.25, netty 4.1.70 #2857
  • Update Gradle Enterprise Plugin to 3.7.1 #2841

:memo: Tasks

  • Consolidating AWS SDK versions for the samples #2858
  • Upgrade to Gradle Wrapper 7.3 #2853
  • Add javax.annotation.Nullable to IllegalImportCheck #2850
  • Upgrade to me.champeau.jmh 0.6.6 #2846
  • Set default task to build in circleci config #2836
  • Reimplement TimeUtils.format() #2833

:heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

  • @​izeye

1.6.12

:beetle: Bug Fixes

  • Fragile reference to private synthetic this$ field #2806
  • High CPU usage while using KafkaStreamsMetrics #2801
  • zgc pause time includes concurrent time #2372

:hammer: Dependency Upgrades

  • Upgrade Spring Boot to 2.3.12.RELEASE in samples for 1.6.x #2827
  • Upgrade AssertJ to 3.21.0 and other test dependencies #2826
  • Pin Prometheus to 0.9.x and consolidate versions for 1.6.x #2825
  • Upgrade dropwizard-metrics to 4.1.26 #2824
  • Upgrade Netflix Spectator libs to 0.135.0 #2823
  • Upgrade to reactor 3.3.21, reactor-netty 0.9.24, netty 4.1.69 #2822
  • Upgrade to nohttp-gradle 0.0.10 #2804

:memo: Tasks

  • Make DynatraceMeterRegistryTest a little more robust #2821
  • Gradle Enterprise Plugin upgrade to 3.7 #2794
  • StepCounter JavaDoc wrong about count rate #2793

... (truncated)

Commits
  • ebcb509 Upgrade to wavefront-sdk-java 2.6.6
  • 4f0e824 Upgrade to signalfx-java 1.0.13
  • 274a521 Consolidating AWS SDK versions for the samples
  • f68f520 Upgrade to reactor 3.3.22, reactor-netty 0.9.25, netty 4.1.70
  • 1d43b28 Merge branch '1.5.x' into 1.6.x
  • aae9bbe Upgrade to Gradle Wrapper 7.3
  • 32e2e76 Remove meters that are not published by Kafka anymore
  • 42af250 DefaultLongTaskTimer histogram bucket counting logic fix (#2851)
  • 9624b8a Add javax.annotation.Nullable to IllegalImportCheck (#2850)
  • c90b1ca Merge branch '1.5.x' into 1.6.x
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

title: [To rel/0.13][IOTDB-3988] Fix reload problem of metric module, and refactor metric module.
body: Cherry-pick from #7239.

title: [IOTDB-4478] [Ratis] Add RatisConsensus config parameters in confignode.properties
body:
# Description
Currently, there are many config parameters available for RatisConsensus. All params can refer to `RatisConfig`.
In this PR, I propose to expose **workload-related** params in confignode.properties so that the user can tune these params according to their workloads.
# Param List
1. ratis_snapshot_trigger_threshold, determine how many logs written to trigger a snapshot.
2. ratis_log_unsafe_flush_enable, determine whether we can flush raft log asynchronous without wait FileChannel.force to return.
3. ratis_log_segment_size_max, determine max capacity of a single Raft Log segment.
4. ratis_grpc_flow_control_window, determine gRPC log appender's flow control window size
5. ratis_rpc_leader_election_timeout_min_ms, determine min election timeout
6. ratis_rpc_leader_election_timeout_max_ms, determine max election timeout

title: [IOTDB-4470] Code generation to accelerate expression calculation
body: At this stage, expression evaluation is based on the volcano model, and the evaluate function is called to the root node of the expression tree, and the tree will recursively call the evaluate function of the subtree to calculate the result of its own node. Such a procedure has a large number of virtual function calls, and each time needs to repeatedly call the function written by the corresponding type through the type of switch expression. The additional overhead of this process is enormous. It is hoped that the handwritten code of the calculation can be directly constructed according to the input expression to improve the execution efficiency

body: https://issues.apache.org/jira/projects/IOTDB/issues/IOTDB-4481

### Content1 ...

In each section, please describe design decisions made, including:

-->

(or naming) decision point and compare the alternatives with the designs that you've implemented

If something hasn't changed since the original discussion, you can omit a detailed discussion of

title: [IOTDB-4479] Add pattern overlap check when deleting timeseries
body:
## Description

### Motivation

The input path patterns may cross different storage groups. SchemaRegion doesn't need to execute unrelated path pattern.

### Modification

Before executing in schemaRegion, filter out all path patterns that overlap with schemaRegion's storage group pattern.

title: print redundancy clean session log when no session exist
body: When session_timeout_threshold is set, SessionTimeoutManager will continue output cleaning log and check cleanup() function even though there is not session exist. So add a judgment before it to save printing redundancy log.

title: [To rel/0.13] AlignedChunkReader should uncompress value page by the compress type in chunkHeader
[IOTDB-4466]error code is incorrect in query with time when session has expired
body:
When session has expired, the error code is incorrect:
IoTDB > select s_70, top_k(s_70, 'k'='2'), bottom_k(s_70, 'k'='2') from root.test.g_19.d_59 where time > 2018-05-21T08:40:25.976+08:00;
Msg: 303: Check metadata error: Input time format 2018-05-21T08:40:25.976+08:00 error. Input like yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss or refer to user document for more info.

It happens on zoneId is null when session has expired and occurs NPE when we get org.apache.iotdb.db.qp.utils.DatetimeUtils#toZoneOffset().

title: [IOTDB-4469] Frame size larger than protect max size!
body:
problem:
Transporting frame size of LoadTsFilePieceNode is larger than MAX FRAME SIZE
too much log info of LoadTsFilePieceNode

solution:
set the max data size of LoadTsFilePieceNode is the half of MAX FRAME SIZE
delete info about chunk data.

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Declared positions (1) does not match column 1's number of entries (0)

    at org.apache.iotdb.db.mpp.execution.operator.schema.NodePathsConvertOperator.next(NodePathsConvertOperator.java:99)

title: [IOTDB-4454] Show build info in cli and SHOW VERSION query
body: See JIRA: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IOTDB-4454

title: [IOTDB-4448] Implement pattern based data deletion in DataRegion to speed up deleting timeseries
body:
## Description

### Modification
Implement pattern based data deletion in DataRegion to speed up deleting timeseries. When encountering path pattern, deviceIds in memtable will be traversed and those matched by given path pattern will be chosen for further data deletion execution.

Clean up all datanode schema cache, which much faster than clean precise timeseries.

title: Fix two issues in retry and multileader
body:
# Description
1. only read operation is allowed to retry
2. Change the default timeout from MAX_VALUE to 1 minute

title: [IOTDB-4453] Fix the overflow of compareTo in TimeRange
body:
## Description

The original implementation used the result value calculated by `this.min - r.min` or`this.max - r.max`. This may encounter Long type overflow.

title: [IOTDB-4420] Monitor DataNode's remain disk space through cluster heartbeat
body:
Updates:

1. Add disk_full_threshold parameter at which a DataNode will be set to ReadOnly status if the remaining disk space is lower.
2. All DataNodes report their current status periodically, so that the ConfigNode-leader always knows the correct status for each DataNode even if the leadership changed.
3. Update user doc

See [DataNode State Machine](https://apache-iotdb.feishu.cn/docx/doxcnALFW1Oxg7wIBkaDWNE6nfh) doc for more details.

title: [To rel/0.13] [IOTDB-4451] Add log for cross space compaction selection when a file has been compacted too many times
body: See [IOTDB-4451](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IOTDB-4451).

title: [IOTDB-4391] Apply PatternTreeMap in parsing .mods file to optimize query
body:
## Description
* `QueryContext`: Use `PatternTreeMap` to parse .mods file. It constructs modification tree once when parsing and getOverlap method cost O(n) time complexity. It will save M*N traversal time if there is a query about M timeseries and length of .mods is N.
* `ChunkMetaData#insertIntoSortedDeletions`: Use TreeMap to store TimeRange. Reduce the time complexity from O(n^2) to O(nlogn).


BTW, I think there are still some potential optimization points. For example, we can sort and merge modification as possible in QueryContext. So if there is a query for a lot of timeseries and there are a lot of modifications about a path pattern, it only need to sort and merge once instead of do it many times in `ChunkMetaData#insertIntoSortedDeletions`.

Experiment：https://apache-iotdb.feishu.cn/docs/doccnMqwBpAYTqkUAj3xaehsXJf#sKUpPL

title: [IOTDB-4430] Restrict multi_dir_strategy to MaxDiskUsableSpaceFirstStrategy when using cluster

title: [IOTDB-4404] Wait for all write-ahead logs flushed before system shuts down
[IOTDB-4419] Maintain RegionStatus through cluster heartbeat
body: I've made the following updates in this PR: 1. Refactor the RegionGroupCache, now ConfigNode will maintain separate RegionCaches for each Region. 2. Maintain RegionStatus through cluster heartbeat. 3. Move showRegion and showDataNode interface from ConfigManager to other sub-Managers. You can read the [Region State Machine](https://apache-iotdb.feishu.cn/docx/doxcnMQppTJCURUuWZ5LfWA5dK6) doc for more details. I've started a 1C3D cluster and finished some tests on my local machine: 1. Create some RegionGroups, the show regions and show datanodes SQL are correct: 2. Shutdonw a DataNode, the corresponding RegionStatus and NodeStatus will become to UNKNOWN after 20s:

title: Update description in UserGuide
body:
1. 使用 OpenID 作为用户名认证登录
- 配置
配置位于 iotdb-engines.properties，设定 authorizer_provider_class 为 org.apache.iotdb.db.auth.authorizer.OpenIdAuthorizer 则开启了 openID 服务，默认情况下值为 org.apache.iotdb.db.auth.authorizer.LocalFileAuthorizer 表示没有开启 openID 服务。
modify: iotdb-engines.properties→iotdb-datanode.properties
2. MQTT 配置
默认情况下，IoTDB MQTT 服务从${IOTDB_HOME}/${IOTDB_CONF}/iotdbengine.properties加载配置。
modify: iotdbengine.properties→iotdb-datanode.properties
3. 开启RESTful 服务
使用者
找到IoTDB安装目录下面的conf/iotdb.properties文件，将 enable_rest_service 设置为 true 以启用该模块。
modify:iotdb.properties→iotdb-rest.properties

title: [IOTDB-4364]Reduce read amplication in compaction
body:
**Description**
In massive timeseries scenarios, each device has 20 timeseries, and each file has tens of thousands of devices, that is, millions of timeseries. Read throughput in cross compaction is 100~1000 times greater than write throughput.

**Solution**
When compacting, it is necessary to obtain devices and timeseries from all source files, as well as the metadata of each timeseries. To avoid traversing the Zesong tree multiple times, we record the intermediate nodes of the Zesong tree. Please refer to [IOTDB-4364](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IOTDB-4364) for the experimental results.

title: [IOTDB-4370] Refactor RegionGroup's creation process and build RegionGroup maintain thread
body: Currently, a RegionGroup is considered to be created successfully only if all the RegionReplica are created successfully on those remote DataNodes. However, a RegionGroup can provide service as long as more than half of its RegionReplicas are alive. Therefore, I make the following improvements to enhance the cluster RegionGroups' availability: 1. A RegionGroup is considered to be created successfully in the CreateRegionGroupsProcedure so long as more than half of its RegionReplicas are created successfully. 2. Refactor the RegionCleaner thread into RegionMaintainer thread, who'll periodically try to restore RegionReplicas or delete redundant RegionReplicas. See the [RegionGroup maintenance](https://apache-iotdb.feishu.cn/docx/doxcnMQppTJCURUuWZ5LfWA5dK6) doc for Chinese details. I started a 1C3D environment on my local machine and done some tests: Shutdown a DataNode and insert some data to create a StorageGroup: Though the data insertion failed, the SchemaRegionGroup and the DataRegionGroup are created successfully. The reason why cause the insertion failure is that, these newborn RegionGroups hadn't done their leader election yet. By the way, **DataNode should optimize its error log in this case.** Finally, even though there was a DataNode is crushed, the data insertion can work properly after leader election:

**Solution**
When compacting, it is necessary to obtain devices and timeseries from all source files, as well as the metadata of each timeseries. To avoid traversing the Zesong tree multiple times, we record the intermediate nodes of the Zesong tree. Please refer to [IOTDB-4364](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IOTDB-4364) for the experimental results.

title: [IOTDB-4356] De-duplication of PathPatternTree
body:
## Description

Fix the bug related to duplicate paths in `PathPatternTree`

1. When `appendPathPattern`, `PathPatternTree` should judge the inclusion relationship between new path and existed paths. The included path should not be stored. The added Pattern may not be a fullPath, so `PathPatternTree` used `matchFullPath()` incorrectly. This pr implements an algorithm to judge the partialPath inclusion relationship to replace `matchFullPath()`.
3. When `getAllDevicePatterns`, `PathPatternTree` should de-duplicate the result set.

title: [IOTDB-4384] Add influxdb and rest modules to the pom file of the example module and rename inflxudb-protocol-example to influxdb-protocol-example
body: See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IOTDB-4384

title: [IOTDB-4377] Fix TTimePartitionSlot count and DataPartition inherit policy bug
body:
I've fixed two bugs in this PR:

1. The SeriesSlot count in the result of show regions are incorrect. 
2. The DataPartitions with larger TTimePartitionSlot can't inherit their predecessor when a batch of contiguous DataPartition are demanded to create synchronously.

I solved these two bugs with one PR because it's too difficult to write stronger test for me if I break them apart.
